snippet: Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas includes Annie Vigier and Franck Apertet’s “Topologie,” in which performers follow a particular route through Long Island City.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews Annie Vigier and Franck Apertet dance piece Topologie, in which performers follow particular route through Long Island City, Queens, as part of Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas.
lead_paragraph: Danse: A French-American Festival of Performance and Ideas includes Annie Vigier and Franck Apertet’s “Topologie,” in which performers follow a particular route through Long Island City.

headline.seo: ‘Topologie,’ a Peripatetic Show From the Chocolate Factory
headline.main: To Please, to Perplex and to Be Barely Noticed on a Dash Through Queens
headline.print_headline: To Please, to Perplex and to Be Barely Noticed on a Dash Through Queens
